mapper.select: select emp.empno, emp.ename, emp.phone, emp.address, emp.email, dept.deptname, position.positionname, acc_status.statuscode from emp join dept on emp.deptcode = dept.deptcode join position on emp.positioncode = position.positioncode join acc_status on emp.statuscode = acc_status.statuscode
select dept.deptcode, dept.deptname, head.headname from dept join head on dept.headcode = head.headcode

select emp.ename, dept.deptname, head.headname, position.positionname from emp inner join dept on emp.deptcode = dept.deptcode inner join head on dept.headcode = head.headcode inner join position on emp.positioncode = position.positioncode where dept.deptname = #{param}
